column5: Well folks, I hope you all have a great week! My family and I are heading up to the French River tomorrow for a week of fun and fishing! My family first started to go to this place (Moonlight Bay Cottages) in the early 70's. Cut my teeth fishing there and have been back numerous times since then. I figured that it would be a great place for my kids to learn a few things, like dock fishing and what not. Anyway, I will be posting some pics when we get back, likely of the panfish type, but one never know for sure, do they. Have a great week folks and see yah when we get back! HH
Have a good family week. A word of warning...this might not be a good time to visit Bernie.

Thanks and funny you mention that Roy... Thursday next week, I have to drive my daughter to Kearney for a week of camp. That'll put me only a few minutes from Powasson and driving right by TJ's as well! Timing won't be right for dropping in on Bernie though...by the time I go by, he'll already be sitting at the cottage enjoying the view! HH
